script.source: if (doc['kibana.alert.rule.tags'].size() > 0) { for (tag in doc['kibana.alert.rule.tags']) { if (tag.startsWith('threat_score_1_risk_level:')) { emit(tag.substring(26)) } } }
if (doc['kibana.alert.rule.tags'].size() > 0) { for (tag in doc['kibana.alert.rule.tags']) { if (tag.startsWith('final_risk_score:')) { emit(Long.parseLong(tag.substring(17))) } } }

if (doc['kibana.alert.rule.tags'].size() > 0) { for (tag in doc['kibana.alert.rule.tags']) { if (tag.startsWith('threat_score_1_risk_level:')) { String level = tag.substring(26); if (level.equals('CRITICAL')) emit(4); else if (level.equals('HIGH')) emit(3); else if (level.equals('MEDIUM')) emit(2); else if (level.equals('LOW')) emit(1); } } }

String h_name = null; if (doc.containsKey('kibana.alert.threshold_result.terms.value') && doc['kibana.alert.threshold_result.terms.value'].size() >= 2) { h_name = doc['kibana.alert.threshold_result.terms.value'][1]; } if (h_name == null && doc.containsKey('agent.name.keyword') && !doc['agent.name.keyword'].empty) { h_name = doc['agent.name.keyword'].value; } if (h_name == null && doc.containsKey('host.hostname.keyword') && !doc['host.hostname.keyword'].empty) { h_name = doc['host.hostname.keyword'].value; } if (h_name == null && doc.containsKey('host.name.keyword') && !doc['host.name.keyword'].empty) { h_name = doc['host.name.keyword'].value; } if (h_name != null) { emit(h_name.toLowerCase()); }
